original_text: One day the older daughter said to the younger, “Our father is old, and there is no man around here to give us children—as is the custom all over the earth.
korean_text: 큰 딸이 작은 딸에게 이르되 우리 아버지는 늙으셨고 온 세상의 도리를 따라 우리의 배필 될 사람이 이 땅에는 없으니

sentences.original_text: One day the older daughter said to the younger
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 큰딸이 작은 딸에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: and there is no man around here
as is the custom all over the earth
